official_title: Resolves that the two House of Congress assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on Wednesday, January 30, 1974, at 9:00 o'clock p.m., for the purpose of receiving such communications as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.

summary.text: Provides for a Joint Session of the House and Senate on Wednesday, January 30, 1974, to receive such communications as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.

titles.title: Resolves that the two House of Congress assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on Wednesday, January 30, 1974, at 9:00 o'clock p.m., for the purpose of receiving such communications as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.
